description: Real-time stock trading interface with portfolio management
High-frequency trading order execution and routing to exchanges
Real-time market data aggregation from NYSE NASDAQ and crypto exchanges
Portfolio valuation risk analytics and P&L calculation
Know Your Customer identity verification via Plaid and Jumio
PostgreSQL storing customer accounts SSN tax IDs and bank details
Time-series database for trade history and transaction records
Double-entry accounting ledger for regulatory compliance
ACH and wire transfer processing via Stripe and Plaid
Cryptocurrency wallet integration Ethereum Bitcoin Solana
Automated SEC filing submission and FINRA reporting
Real-time fraud detection using ML models on transaction patterns
Event streaming for order flow and market data distribution
In-memory cache for market quotes and session management
